Chipotle Mexican Grill Inc (CMG) has dropped over 15% in the past month alone.
Chipotle is still trying to recover from a series of food-borne illness outbreaks in 2015, which led to a decline in sales and profits.

The SEC is investigating whether Chipotle made misleading statements or omissions in its reporting of sales data for chorizo.
